text: Hypargos is a genus of estrildid finch from the family Estrildidae. ==Species== The two species are found in Sub-Saharan Africa and are among the twinspots: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Image !! Common Name !! Scientific name !! Distribution |- |120px || Red-throated twinspot|| Hypargos niveoguttatus ||Angola, Burundi, The Democratic Republic of the Congo, Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, Somalia, South Africa, Tanzania, Zambia & Zimbabwe. |- |120px || Pink-throated twinspot||Hypargos margaritatus || Mozambique, South Africa and Swaziland |- |} ==External links== * *
title: Hypargos (bird)
